item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

I am pleased to announce our 4th Karaoke Meetup.

We will start off as usual in a private room at 8:00PM,
but at 9:00PM, we will join the main stage and Karaoke
with a "Live Band"!

This is a wonderful opportunity for everyone to get
involved. If you enjoy Karaoking, the audience
is friendly and kind. If you are still too shy, just come
and listen, there's no pressure to perform if you are
not ready yet. But most importantly, just come and
enjoy some music.

At 9:00PM, for those of you who are interested, you
can Karaoke with a Live Band. Yes, that's right, you
can have live background music, this is a real treat
for those who have never experienced this before.

So please invite your friends and sign up now.

The price will cover the room, one drink and
some appetizers. Please RSVP by November 15th,
so I can get an accurate count.

Thank You
item.name: Karaoke Meetup at the Limelight
